title: mlflow serve command with --no-conda not working in windows python environment
body:
python env: 
python- 3.7.7
mlflow- 1.10.0

mlflow project folder created successfully with all the required files.
getting the following error while tried to deploy the model. 

(custom_ml_env) C:\Users\644947\CSAT\custom_model_templates\mlflow_impl_guide\classification>mlflow models serve -m runs:/92c6059bbea54c378bf1320f1a5632d1/artifacts/model -p 1234 --no-conda
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\644947\python3.7.7\lib\runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", mod_spec)
  File "C:\Users\644947\python3.7.7\lib\runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)
  File "C:\Users\644947\custom_ml_env\Scripts\mlflow.exe\__main__.py", line 9, in <module>
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\click\core.py", line 829, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\click\core.py", line 782, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\click\core.py", line 1259, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\click\core.py", line 1259, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\click\core.py", line 1066, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\click\core.py", line 610, in invoke
    return callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\models\cli.py", line 58, in serve
    install_mlflow=install_mlflow).serve(model_uri=model_uri, port=port,
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\models\cli.py", line 165, in _get_flavor_backend
    append_to_uri_path(underlying_model_uri, MLMODEL_FILE_NAME), output_path=tmp.path())
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\tracking\artifact_utils.py", line 74, in _download_artifact_from_uri
    artifact_path=artifact_path, dst_path=output_path)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\store\artifact\runs_artifact_repo.py", line 116, in download_artifacts
    return self.repo.download_artifacts(artifact_path, dst_path)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\store\artifact\local_artifact_repo.py", line 67, in download_artifacts
    return super(LocalArtifactRepository, self).download_artifacts(artifact_path, dst_path)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\store\artifact\artifact_repo.py", line 130, in download_artifacts
    return download_file(artifact_path)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\store\artifact\artifact_repo.py", line 90, in download_file
    self._download_file(remote_file_path=fullpath, local_path=local_file_path)
  File "c:\users\644947\custom_ml_env\lib\site-packages\mlflow\store\artifact\local_artifact_repo.py", line 95, in _download_file
    shutil.copyfile(remote_file_path, local_path)
  File "C:\Users\644947\python3.7.7\lib\shutil.py", line 120, in copyfile
    with open(src, 'rb') as fsrc:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'C:\\Users\\644947\\CSAT\\custom_model_templates\\mlflow_impl_guide\\classification\\mlruns\\0\\92c6059bbea54c378bf1320f1a5632d1\\artifacts\\artifacts\\model\\MLmodel'
